thread.section_title: Hotel du Triangle d'Or - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location and value for money
thread.title_full: Good location and value for money - Review of Hotel du Triangle d'Or, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: peihaotseng
title: Good location and value for money
text:
The hotel location is within 5 mins walk to Madeleine metro station.
Small size room but has all what a visitor needs.
The room was comfortable and quiet.
All in all, good value for money in central Paris.
Room Tip: Asking a top floor or higher floor room See more room tips
